## Info

In this video, I take on the challenge of creating the fastest and most reliable wireless bridge between my house and garage‚Äîwithout digging trenches or laying cable. Over the years, my wireless setup has faced growing interference from neighbors, radar, and the increasing number of devices on the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands. It's time for an upgrade!

I‚Äôll walk you through my journey, testing different setups, including mesh networks, point-to-point links, and a new outdoor UniFi access point with WiFi 7. I'll show you what worked, what didn‚Äôt, and how I ultimately built a stable, high-performance connection that meets my needs.
